00012 UITextViewWidget::UITextViewWidget(boost::shared_ptr<const TranslationManager> translation_manager,
00013                                    boost::shared_ptr<StarredVersesModel> starred_verses_model,
00014                                    QWidget* parent) :
00015     QWidget(parent),
00016     m_translation_manager(translation_manager),
00017     m_starred_verses_model(starred_verses_model),
00018     m_displayed_verse(new VerseDisplay("", -1, -1)),
00019     m_title(new QLabel()),
00020     m_text(new QTextEdit()),
00021     m_more_button(new QToolButton()),
00022     m_less_button(new QToolButton()),
00023     m_star_button(new QToolButton()),
00024     m_prev_button(new QToolButton()),
00025     m_next_button(new QToolButton())
00026 {
00027     QObject::connect(m_more_button, SIGNAL(clicked()), this, SLOT(increase_displayed_context()));
00028     QObject::connect(m_less_button, SIGNAL(clicked()), this, SLOT(decrease_displayed_context()));
00029     QObject::connect(m_next_button, SIGNAL(clicked()), this, SLOT(display_next_verse()));
00030     QObject::connect(m_prev_button, SIGNAL(clicked()), this, SLOT(display_prev_verse()));
00031     QObject::connect(m_star_button, SIGNAL(clicked()), this, SLOT(change_star_button_icon()));
00032     QObject::connect(m_star_button, SIGNAL(clicked()), this, SLOT(change_starred_verse_state()));
00033 
00034     m_star_button->setEnabled(false);
00035     m_star_button->setIcon(QIcon("icons/star_off.png"));
00036     m_star_button->setToolTip(tr("Save this verse"));
00037     m_star_button->setCheckable(true);
00038 
00039     m_more_button->setEnabled(false);
00040     m_more_button->setIcon(QIcon("icons/plus.png"));
00041     m_more_button->setToolTip(tr("Show more context"));
00042     
00043     m_less_button->setEnabled(false);
00044     m_less_button->setIcon(QIcon("icons/minus.png"));
00045     m_less_button->setToolTip(tr("Show less context"));
00046 
00047     m_next_button->setEnabled(false);
00048     m_next_button->setIcon(QIcon("icons/next.png"));
00049     m_next_button->setToolTip(tr("Next verse"));
00050 
00051     m_prev_button->setEnabled(false);
00052     m_prev_button->setIcon(QIcon("icons/prev.png"));
00053     m_prev_button->setToolTip(tr("Previous verse"));
00054 
00055     QHBoxLayout* header_row = new QHBoxLayout;
00056 
00057     header_row->addWidget(m_title);
00058     header_row->addWidget(m_star_button);
00059     header_row->addWidget(m_less_button);
00060     header_row->addWidget(m_more_button);
00061     header_row->addWidget(m_prev_button);
00062     header_row->addWidget(m_next_button);
00063 
00064     m_text->setReadOnly(true);
00065 
00066     QVBoxLayout* layout = new QVBoxLayout;
00067 
00068     layout->addLayout(header_row);
00069     layout->addWidget(m_text);
00070 
00071     setLayout(layout);
00072 }

00074 void UITextViewWidget::display_text(boost::shared_ptr<VerseDisplay> verse)
00075 {
00076     m_displayed_verse = verse;
00077 
00078     boost::shared_ptr<const Translation> translation = m_translation_manager->at(verse->get_translation());
00079 
00080     std::vector<boost::shared_ptr<const Verse> > verses = translation->get_entry(m_displayed_verse->get_verse_id(),
00081                                                                                  m_displayed_verse->get_num_verses_context());
00082     m_title->setText(verse_collection_title(verses, translation).c_str());
00083     m_text->setText(verse_collection_to_string(verses).c_str());
00084 
00085     m_star_button->setChecked(m_starred_verses_model->verse_starred(m_displayed_verse));
00086 
00087     change_star_button_icon();
00088 
00089     m_star_button->setEnabled(star_button_should_be_enabled());
00090     m_more_button->setEnabled(more_button_should_be_enabled());
00091     m_less_button->setEnabled(less_button_should_be_enabled());
00092     m_next_button->setEnabled(next_button_should_be_enabled());
00093     m_prev_button->setEnabled(prev_button_should_be_enabled());
00094 }
00095 
00096 void UITextViewWidget::increase_displayed_context()
00097 {
00098     m_displayed_verse = boost::shared_ptr<VerseDisplay>(new VerseDisplay(m_displayed_verse->get_translation(), m_displayed_verse->get_verse_id(), 
00099                                                                          m_displayed_verse->get_num_verses_context() + 1));
00100     
00101     display_text(m_displayed_verse);
00102 }
00103 
00104 void UITextViewWidget::decrease_displayed_context()
00105 {
00106     int requested_displayed_context = m_displayed_verse->get_num_verses_context() - 1;
00107     
00108     if (requested_displayed_context >= 0)
00109     {
00110         m_displayed_verse = boost::shared_ptr<VerseDisplay>(new VerseDisplay(m_displayed_verse->get_translation(), m_displayed_verse->get_verse_id(), 
00111                                                                              requested_displayed_context));
00112         display_text(m_displayed_verse);
00113     }
00114 }
00115 
00116 void UITextViewWidget::display_next_verse()
00117 {
00118     int requested_next_verse = m_displayed_verse->get_verse_id() + 1;
00119 
00120     boost::shared_ptr<const Translation> translation = m_translation_manager->at(m_displayed_verse->get_translation());
00121     if (requested_next_verse < translation->num_entries()-1)
00122     {
00123         m_displayed_verse = boost::shared_ptr<VerseDisplay>(new VerseDisplay(m_displayed_verse->get_translation(), m_displayed_verse->get_verse_id() +1, 
00124                                                                              m_displayed_verse->get_num_verses_context()));
00125         display_text(m_displayed_verse);
00126         
00127         if (!next_button_should_be_enabled() && m_next_button->isEnabled())
00128             m_next_button->setEnabled(false);
00129 
00130         if (!m_prev_button->isEnabled())
00131             m_prev_button->setEnabled(true);
00132     }
00133 }
00134 
00135 void UITextViewWidget::display_prev_verse()
00136 {
00137     int requested_next_verse = m_displayed_verse->get_verse_id() - 1;
00138 
00139     if (requested_next_verse >= 0)
00140     {
00141         m_displayed_verse = boost::shared_ptr<VerseDisplay>(new VerseDisplay(m_displayed_verse->get_translation(), m_displayed_verse->get_verse_id() - 1, 
00142                                                                              m_displayed_verse->get_num_verses_context()));
00143         display_text(m_displayed_verse);
00144 
00145         if (!prev_button_should_be_enabled() && m_prev_button->isEnabled())
00146             m_prev_button->setEnabled(false);
00147         
00148         if (!m_next_button->isEnabled())
00149             m_next_button->setEnabled(true);
00150     }
00151 }
00152 
00153 void UITextViewWidget::change_star_button_icon()
00154 {
00155     if (m_star_button->isChecked())
00156         m_star_button->setIcon(QIcon("icons/star_on.png"));
00157     else
00158         m_star_button->setIcon(QIcon("icons/star_off.png"));
00159 }
00160 
00161 void UITextViewWidget::change_starred_verse_state()
00162 {
00163     if (m_star_button->isChecked())
00164         emit verse_starred(m_displayed_verse);
00165     else
00166         emit verse_unstarred(m_displayed_verse);
00167 }
00168 
00169 bool UITextViewWidget::prev_button_should_be_enabled()
00170 {
00171     return m_displayed_verse->get_verse_id() > 0;
00172 }
00173 
00174 bool UITextViewWidget::next_button_should_be_enabled()
00175 {
00176     boost::shared_ptr<const Translation> translation = m_translation_manager->at(m_displayed_verse->get_translation());
00177     return m_displayed_verse->get_verse_id() != translation->num_entries()-1;
00178 }
00179 
00180 bool UITextViewWidget::more_button_should_be_enabled()
00181 {
00182     return m_displayed_verse->get_verse_id() != -1;
00183 }
00184 
00185 bool UITextViewWidget::less_button_should_be_enabled()
00186 {
00187     return m_displayed_verse->get_num_verses_context() > 0;
00188 }
00189 
00190 bool UITextViewWidget::star_button_should_be_enabled()
00191 {
00192     return m_displayed_verse->get_verse_id() != -1;
00193 }
